# ETL

## Load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rstatix)
library(ggplot2)
```


## Load data

We create a list of data frames for faster de creation of the data.

```{r}
file_paths <- fs::dir_ls("/home/fredvasconcelos/Documentos/educacao/alunos/2009_2021/")

listed_df <- file_paths %>%
  map(function (path) {
    read.csv(path, sep = ';', encoding = 'latin1')
  }) %>%
  tibble() 
```

## Merge data frames

```{r}
df_cursos <- listed_df %>%
  unnest(cols = '.')
```
